data.introduce: ServiceList接口可用来查看航班可购买的附加服务产品，用户可以在预订之前购买附加服务，也可以在出票后追加附加服务。
data.business:
目前支持的业务范围：
预订时查询附加服务；（目前仅AY、SQ、QF支持）；
生成订单未出票时，查询附加服务；（目前仅AY、SQ、QF支持）；
出票后追加附加服务的查询；（目前仅AY、SQ、QF支持）；
免费及付费附加服务产品的查询。
支持全服务航司及低成本航司。
典型业务场景：创建订单的同时购买附加服务
接口调用顺序：机票查询，验价，查询附加服务，创建订单同时购买附加服务并出票（延迟支付）
1. AirShoppingRQ / AirShoppingRS
2. OfferPriceRQ / OfferPriceRS
3. ServiceListRQ/ServiceListRS
4. OrderCreateRQ/ OrderViewRS
创建订单购买附加服务实例： EMBED   \* MERGEFORMAT 
典型业务场景：出票成功后追加附加服务
接口调用顺序：机票查询，验价，创建订单并出票（延迟支付），查询附加服务，将附加服务添加到订单中，对附加服务付款并出票
1. AirShoppingRQ / AirShoppingRS
2. OfferPriceRQ / OfferPriceRS
3. OrderCreateRQ/ OrderViewRS
4. OrderChangeRQ(with FOP) / OrderViewRS
5.ServiceListRQ/ServiceListRS
6.OrderChangeWithFOP/OrderViewRS
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"IATA_ServiceListRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"The ServiceList transaction set returns a list of all applicable ancillary services that meet request qualifiers and flights.The message supports shopping for additional a la carte services to compliment any selected offer, as well as shopping for specialty service items not generally included in an initial offer but rather based on service search filters, e.g. sports equipment specialty baggage and unaccompanied minor fees.The message also returns multi-media content at the message level and media references at the individual service level.","children":[{"name":"AugmentationPoint","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"自定义扩展结点","children":[{"name":"ResponseParameters","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"与返回相关的参数。","children":[{"name":"UPAInd","type":"string","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"为true时，返回UPA信息，默认为false","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"MessageDoc","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"NDC Message Document information.","children":[{"name":"Name","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"A name is a word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a person, place, thing or concept","children":[]}]},{"name":"Party","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"NDC Message/ Transaction Party(s) information. Note that information about parties is intended for business use, it is not intended for transaction authentication and routing of the message.","children":[{"name":"Sender","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"Message sender information.","children":[{"name":"TravelAgency","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"A private retailer or public service that provides travel and tourism related services to the public on behalf of suppliers such as activities, airlines, car rentals, cruise lines, hotels, railways, travel insurance, and package tours.","children":[{"name":"AgencyID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]},{"name":"PseudoCityID","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]}]}]}]},{"name":"PayloadAttributes","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"The IATA_PayloadStdAttributes defines the standard attributes that appear on the root element for all IATA payloads.","children":[{"name":"TrxID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]},{"name":"VersionNumber","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"A mathematical number that is assigned or is determined by calculation.","children":[]}]},{"name":"PointOfSale","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"The place at which a retail transaction is carried out.","children":[{"name":"City","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"City (e.g., Dublin), town, or postal station (i.e., a postal service territory, often used in IATA airport or city codes.","children":[]}]},{"name":"Country","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"A nation with its own government, occupying a particular references.","children":[{"name":"Offer","type":"object","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"A proposal to sell a specific set of products or Services under specific conditions, for a Can be the response to a shopping request.","children":[{"name":"OfferID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]},{"name":"OfferItem","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"A priced grouping of one or more services within an Offer.","children":[{"name":"OfferItemID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]},{"name":"OwnerCode","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Either the IATA-defined 2-character code or the ICAO-defined 3-character code of an airline, as per the length of the value.","children":[]},{"name":"Service","type":"object","quantity":"1..n","default":"","description":"The instance of a specific flight or Service Definition as it has been offered (and eventually ordered and consumed) in the context of a specific Offer and/or Order.","children":[{"name":"ServiceID","type":"object","quantity":"1..1","default":"","description":"An identifier is a character string used to uniquely identify one instance of an object within an identification scheme that is managed by an agency.","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"OwnerCode","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"Either the IATA-defined 2-character code or the ICAO-defined 3-character code of an airline, as per the length of the value.","children":[]}]},{"name":"Order","type":"object","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"A uniquely identified record of the agreement of one party with another to receive products and services under specified terms and conditions.
